Text.Text: Well met.  I'm Orrick the Grey, master of this tower.  Your presence here is... unexpected.  What would you have of me?
Apology accepted.  How may I aid you?
Very well.  Feel free to ask me what you will.
I'm conducting research on a type of spell known as a mythal.  There is one in place here at the Hand.
Yes, you are correct.  They are the most powerful spell of protection that has ever been devised by mortal man.  It is a lost art that I'm trying to unlock the secrets to.
They are the most powerful spell of protection that has ever been devised by mortals.  It is a lost art that I'm trying to unlock the secrets to.
Forgive me, but I'm not at liberty to say.  I must ask that we speak of something else.
I tend to ignore events around me, good or ill, and not take sides in matters... unless they affect me directly.  Thus, I've been labeled a *Grey* magician rather than a *Black* or a *White* one.
No, I'm not.  However, I don't openly oppose them either.  My position here is difficult to understand.
When Isair and Madae first came to the Hand, I ignored them.  I didn't consider them to be a serious threat to me, and my research was more important anyway.
Over the years, they have proven that they are indeed a serious threat.  However, they now have a strong following and are firmly entrenched here.  The time to act against them has passed.

Precisely.  At this point, neither side is certain that they can defeat the other.  So, we are in a stalemate with each of us watching the other for a sign of weakness.  When the opportunity arises, we will strike.
Well, I'll not oppose them openly, but I'll do what I can for you discreetly.  There is some important information that you should have.
From time to time I've had to make concessions to Isair and Madae to keep the situation here in balance.  One such concession was to aid them in the creation of a radiant pool.
Yes.  Magical energy so pure and concentrated that it appears to flow like water.
It is a pool of magical energy so pure and concentrated that it appears to flow like water.

They can replenish their health and magical energies by drinking from the pool.  If you wish to end their reign, you must first taint the pool.  It can be found near their private chambers on the third floor of the Hand.
Hmm.  I remember when we created the pool I was having difficulty tapping into the mythal.  Madae began chanting and calling upon her deity, Iyachtu Xvim...
Yes, I believe so.  Perhaps one of the priests here at the hand would know how to taint the pool, but I think it unlikely that they would tell you.
I agree.  By all means, seek out a priest.
Oh?  What did he say?
It's worth a try.  By all means, do so.
I'm not certain that I can defeat them, even with your aid.  By not confronting them openly, I'm protecting my own interests...
Yes, but it was not an easy task.  I had to tap into the power of the mythal that protects the Hand.  I'm afraid that my actions will come back to haunt me...
I assume that you've noticed the vile growth that covers most of the architecture here?
It was not long after creating the pool that that growth began to appear.  It started slowly at first, but has become more prolific of late.
It indicates two things.  First, the mythal has most likely become corrupt.  Second, it's active and taking a role in altering its environment.
It should be making an effort to preserve the Hand, not further the changes inflicted by Isair and Madae.  Unless...
Unless it is trying to attune itself so that...  Hmm.  I can't speak further on this.  I need to investigate some things first.
You seek my aid?  I take it you are not going to ally with Vese Nejj then?  I know that you have spoken with him.

You choose your friends wisely.  Very well, I'll consider you an ally.  As far as aiding you, I'll not openly oppose them, but I'll do what I can for you discreetly.  There is some important information that you should have.
Hmm.  You seek my aid?  It's my understanding that you're in league with Vese Nejj of the Thayvian enclave.  You did tell him how to get into this tower, did you not?
Vese Nejj and I have been at odds for some time.  I make it a point to keep an eye on him... and his associates.  You did betray me to him.
I don't know.  It would be nice to have them out of the way, once and for all...  I'll tell you what, I'll not oppose them openly, but I'll do what I can for you discreetly.
There is some information that you should have before you confront them.

You need not worry.  No harm will come from your actions.  I've already taken measures to counter them.  The portal pattern that you use is now unique to you.  Anyone else who attempts to use it will fail.  As for aiding you...

Hmm.  You seek my aid?  It's my understanding that you're in league with Vese Nejj of the Thayvian enclave.  You did tell him how to get into this tower, did you not?  I also believe you stole some items from me as well.  Yes?
Vese Nejj and I have been at odds for some time.  I make it a point to keep an eye on him... and his associates.  You did betray me to him.

You need not worry.  No harm will come from your actions.  I've already taken measures to counter them.  The portal pattern that you use is now unique to you.  Anyone else who attempts to use it will fail.
Shadow magic copies of the originals.  They will fade to dust when I wish it.  Now, as for aiding you...
Oh?  How so?
Yes, I'm aware of that.  I was wondering if you would be open with me and tell me about it.
Vese Nejj and I have been at odds for some time.  I make it a point to keep an eye on him... and his associates.  I know that you spoke with him, and I know what he asked you to do.
Oh?  How so?
Yes, I'm aware of that.  I was wondering if you would be open with me and tell me about it.
Vese Nejj and I have been at odds for some time.  I make it a point to keep an eye on him... and his associates.  I know what you've done.

You need not worry.  No harm will come from your actions.  I've already taken measures to counter them.  The portal pattern that you use is now unique to you.  Anyone else who attempts to use it will fail.
Oh?  How so?
Yes, I'm aware of that.  I was wondering if you would be open with me and tell me about it.
Vese Nejj and I have been at odds for some time.  I make it a point to keep an eye on him... and his associates.  I know what you've done.

You need not worry.  No harm will come from your actions.  I've already taken measures to counter them.  The portal pattern that you use is now unique to you.  Anyone else who attempts to use it will fail.
Shadow magic copies of the originals.  They will fade to dust when I wish it.
Are there any other matters you wish to discuss?
Over the years many slaves have made their way here.  I've returned most of them to their homes.  A few are in my service, watching over properties that I own.
Yes I do.  I pay them an honest wage for the work that they do.
I really don't care about their fate.  I've provided a means for their escape, but I leave it up to them to discover it.
Yes, I have.  I claim that I have no knowledge of their whereabouts.  I doubt anyone believes me, but I don't care.
Certainly.  If he can make his way to my tower, I can send him home via one of the portals, or perhaps I'll simply teleport him myself.
Well, you've returned.  What do you want of me?
Yes, and it does not bode well...

The mythal was originally cast by the elven mage Larrel.  In creating it, he bound it in part to the outer plane known as Arvandor.  This isn't surprising since that is the abode of many of the elven deities.
Well, my investigation now shows the mythal to be tied to the plane of limbo.
I don't fully understand the implications of this myself.  I can only guess at what is going to happen next.
There are cases where a mythal has shifted an entire region under its protection to another plane.  If I had to guess, I would say that this mythal is preparing to do the same.
No... but I'm not going to take any chances.  I must prepare for this, just in case.

Well...  If the mythal begins to shift, you'll know it.  All hell will break loose.  When you see that happening, run for the nearest exit.  If you're still here when the shift is complete you'll be trapped.  Is that understood?
Good.  Now off with you, I have preparations to make and no time for chatter.  Farewell.
You need not seek me out, Madae.  As you can see, I'm here.

You know very well what's happening, Isair.  The mythal is active and it has claimed you and your sister as its own.  I warned you that something like this would happen if you continued with your tampering...

I can't reverse it, Madae.  Don't you understand anything of what I've said to you in the past?  Have all of my warnings gone unheeded?  This entire structure is shifting itself to limbo and it's taking you and your brother with it!
You adventurers must flee here!  Flee now, unless you wish to suffer their fate!
I've severed my tower's ties with the Hand.  It should survive the shift... or so I believe.  I'll return there and await the outcome of all this.  Farewell.
My patience with you is at an end.  I've given you three chances to learn some manners, you've failed miserably.  Now you die.
I've had enough of you.  Since you like to fight, I'll send you somewhere you can fight.  Now, get out!
I warned you once about your actions, I will not warn you again.  Now, get out!
I'll not tolerate such actions in my demesne.  Allow me to show you to the exit!
I believe that to be correct, yes.  My knowledge of the planes is somewhat limited.
Yes.  He came to me, and I sent him back to Bryn Shander.
Yes, it is.  Why do you ask?
I apologize if I am inconveniencing you.
There are some matters that I would discuss with you.
I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
There are some matters that I would discuss with you.
What are you doing here?
Why are you called Orrick the Grey?
Are you in league with the Legion of the Chimera?
I have been told that many slaves have entered the portals that lead here.  I see no slaves.  Where are they?
I have freed a prisoner named Puddy Talltale.  He would like to return home, but cannot find his way out.  Can you help him?
Never mind.  I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
If I remember correctly, mythals are powerful protection spells are they not?
I am not familiar with mythals.  Can you tell me about them?
Is your research progressing well?
Is your research progressing well?
Is your research progressing well?
Why are you called Orrick the Grey?
Are you in league with the Legion of the Chimera?
I see.
Are you in league with the Legion of the Chimera?
I see.
What do you mean?
Go on.
So you intend to do nothing?
I am here to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
I am here to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
I am here to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
I am here to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
They have asked me to tip the scales against you, Orrick.
I may have tipped the scales in their favor, Orrick.
I may have tipped the scales in their favor, Orrick.
What information is that?
Why will you not oppose them openly?
A radiant pool?  Is that not a pool of pure magical energy?
I have no idea what a radiant pool is.  Can you explain?
I have spoken with a priest of Ilmater here at the Hand.  He mentioned the pool as well.
You were able to create such a thing?
You were able to create such a thing?
How does one do that?
I have spoken with a priest of Ilmater here at the Hand.  He mentioned the pool as well.
Do you suspect that divine power was used in the creation of the pool?
Still, it is worth looking into.
I have spoken with a priest of Ilmater here at the Hand.  He mentioned the pool as well.
Very well, I shall do so.
He thinks that the pool can be tainted with a purification ritual.  He has asked me to perform this.
He felt that the pool could be tainted with a purification ritual.  I have performed the ritual, and I am ready to taint the pool.
He felt that the pool could be tainted with a purification ritual.  I have performed the ritual, and I have successfully tainted the pool.
Very well, I shall do so.
I see...  So what is this information you have for me?
Haunt you?  How so?
Yes.  What of it?
What is the meaning of that?
Let us return to our discussion of the pool.  How does it benefit Isair and Madae?
Why do you say that the mythal is corrupt?
Unless what?
Let us return to our discussion of the pool.  How does it benefit Isair and Madae?
He has asked me for my aid, but I have no intention of giving it.  I would ally with you, Orrick.
What information is that?
Why will you not oppose them openly?
How do you know this?
Yes, but I regret my actions.  I would make amends with you, Orrick.
I suppose I cannot count on you for aid then.
Yes, but I regret my actions.  I would make amends with you, Orrick.
I would be grateful, Orrick.
What information is that?
Yes?
How do you know this?
Yes, but I regret my actions.  I would make amends with you, Orrick.
I suppose I cannot count on you for aid then.
Yes, but I regret my actions.  I would make amends with you, Orrick.
And the items?
Yes?
Vese Nejj asked me to find a way into this tower and report back to him.
You know?  How could you?
I would like to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
Very well, farewell.
Vese Nejj asked me to find a way into this tower and report back to him.  I have done so...
You know?  How could you?
I regret my actions.  I would make amends with you, Orrick.
I would like to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
Very well, farewell.
Vese Nejj asked me to find a way into this tower and report back to him.  He also asked me to steal some items.  I have done both...
You know?  How could you?
I regret my actions.  I would make amends with you, Orrick.
And the items?
I would like to put an end to Isair and Madae.  Will you help me?
Very well, farewell.
What are you doing here?
Why are you called Orrick the Grey?
Are you in league with the Legion of the Chimera?
I have been told that many slaves have entered the portals that lead here.  I see no slaves.  Where are they?
I have freed a prisoner named Puddy Talltale.  He would like to return home, but cannot find his way out.  Can you help him?
I was wondering if Puddy Talltale made it to you safely.
I wanted to let you know that I have performed the purification ritual, and I have tainted the pool.
I wanted to let you know that I have performed the purification ritual, and I am ready to taint the pool.
I remember you telling me that your situation here at the Hand is a precarious one.
Not at this time.  Farewell for now.
You employ them?
Why not free all the slaves at the Hand?
Why not free all the slaves at the Hand?
I see...
Have you been questioned about the fate of the slaves?
I see...
I have freed a prisoner named Puddy Talltale.  He would like to return home, but cannot find his way out.  Can you help him?
I am grateful, Orrick.  I will let him know.
What are you doing here?
Why are you called Orrick the Grey?
Are you in league with the Legion of the Chimera?
I have been told that many slaves have entered the portals that lead here.  I see no slaves.  Where are they?
I have freed a prisoner named Puddy Talltale.  He would like to return home, but cannot find his way out.  Can you help him?
I was wondering if Puddy Talltale made it to you safely.
I wanted to let you know that I have performed the purification ritual, and I am ready to taint the pool.
I wanted to let you know that I have performed the purification ritual, and I have tainted the pool.
When we last spoke, you said you needed to investigate why the mythal was causing the growths in the Hand.  Have you done so?
I remember you telling me that your situation here at the Hand is a precarious one.
Never mind.  I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
Why?  What does it mean?
Go on.
I do not understand the importance of this.  Can you explain?
Limbo?  The plane of chaos, correct?
And your guess is?
Are you certain?
What should I do?
Yes, Orrick.
Very well, farewell.
What of you, Orrick?
You need not tell me twice.  Farewell.
Farewell, Orrick.
I do not understand the importance of this.  Can you explain?
I am glad to hear that.
They have asked me to tip the scales against you, Orrick.
I may have tipped the scales in their favor, Orrick.
I may have tipped the scales in their favor, Orrick.
